backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the animation feature to App.tsx and index.css with metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend files and their roles in the Valentine app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining extensive OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML page mounting the React app with a root div and script entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main Valentine interaction view handling Yes/No button behavior, evasive No movement, confetti, and acceptance reveal.
Generates and animates 80 falling confetti pieces with randomized properties.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth provider and hook managing identity state, login, logout, and persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles, theme variables, and playful animations including wiggle and bounce effects for buttons.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entrypoint setting up QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the projectâ€™s architecture, features, assets, and versioned state for an ICP app with Motoko backend and React/Tailwind frontend.
